title: MoHR along with Amna Janjua call on PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, July 14 (APP): Minister for Human Rights Dr Shireen Mazari along with Chairperson Defence of Human Rights Amna Masood Janjua Wednesday call on Prime Minister Imran Khan.
During the meeting, the issue of missing persons was discussed in detail and it was informed that a bill in the parliamentary committee with regard to it would be tabled soon for approval.
The prime minister appreciated the steps taken by the ministry under the guidance of Dr Mazari for the protection of human rights.
